review: We love our Fire Stick! We use it a lot and get great access to thousands of shows and movies. Highly recommend.
author: Randy Stevens

review: Super easy to hook up and start using. Really pretty amazing for a great price.
author: Sober Boss

review: Perfect for bedroom TV to watch Netflix or Prime Videos
author: Randall J Britto

review: The Fire stick exceed my expectations, easy install and love the access to music, movies, and other media.
author: Bobby Carter

review: So far so good.  I love the little graphic man that teaches you how to operate the fire stick.  Simple and effective.  I was so proud to have figured this out without having to call a teenager to explain it all!  Am enjoying the benefits of Amazon Prime.
author: Leah Schafer

review: Works well fast clean streaming. Get the voice remote to save you time searching. Easy set up
author: neperson

review: Love this system as it allows me to use my prime membership to its fullest
author: Roxanna

review: I love my fire stick. I watch more movies with my prime membership than I watch on regular TV and cable. Love it!
author: Peeky
